TopicTitle: Any way for search to get links to posts?

Articles.Content:
I wanted to find if anyone has made any MK3 profile SSTO crafts in 1.0.2

Unfortunately the search returns threads that are 300+ pages long. Good luck finding the relevant posts in that.

Any way to get the search to return links to relevant posts instead of the enormous threads?

Use the advanced search, and select "Show Results as Posts":

![SearchPosts.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/Moderation/SearchPosts.png)

Where did you find that page? Or do I need special privileges?

![Bp1UxxG.png](http://i.imgur.com/Bp1UxxG.png)
Click the "Search Single Content Type" tab at the top.
Thank you very much! I was confused by the tab colors, sure I already was on that page.
